cast.name: 德雷娅·卡斯特罗 Drea Castro

introduction: Abdul Rasheed (Jamal Williams)is an architect who is in love with an attorney named Rachel Caldwell (Sarah Burgess). Their religion is the one thing that is keeping them apart. Abdul is Islamic and Rachel is Jewish. Rachel and Abdul's relationship cannot grow properly because they are always hiding it. Rachel's friend Ariella Walsh (Kayla Cooper) and Abdul's friend Marshall Bradley (Arlando Whittaker, BET's College Hill) are behind them 100 percent. They both face obstacles with their parent's involvement with trying to set them up with the right soul mate. Things get heated when a friend of Rachel's mother Daniel Kohen (Gentry Ferrell, Bigfoot at Holler Creek Canyon) attempts to kill Abdul due to his obsession with Rachel. Eventually they reveal the truth which leads to more controversy. From Actor, Producer and Director Eli Harris (The Nanny Diaries, Saga Tier,16 Blocks, XXX2, The Sopranos)comes a gripping and epic tale of an age old war with a modern day love divided by centuries of hate. This is their story JEWSLIM.... A Forbidden Love. An Accepted Hate.
